main event: A resident of Wichita, Kansas reported observing an unidentified flying object on 6 December 1954.
interesting points: The object was approximately 40 to 50 feet in diameter and circular in shape., The object flew at an altitude of about 2,000 feet and remained stationary for about five minutes., The witness observed the object lose altitude and accelerate rapidly out of sight., An investigation by the Office of Special Investigations confirmed the report as accurate., The sighting was later considered to possibly be caused by an aircraft.
